Elyse Whittaker-Paek:

artist + illustrator

About Elyse Watercolor Portraits Illustrations Instagram Feed Client Reviews Contact Elyse

Share

Thank you so much for stopping by!

I invite you to browse through this site to see examples of custom, hand-painted watercolor portraits of homes, along with digital backgrounds for newborn photography and children's book illustrations — I would love to discuss your personalized watercolor home portrait or other illustration project you might have in mind.

With a BFA in Illustration, my professional experience includes character design, prop design, and storyboards, working for more than 10 years in the animation industry in Los Angeles, where I collaborated with creative teams at the Warner Bros. and Nickelodeon studios. My credits include the feature film Space Jam and Nickelodeon TV shows such as "Dora the Explorer," "Hey Arnold," and "Oswald the Octopus."

As a children's book illustrator, I was thrilled in 2014 to win first place at the Feathered Quill Book Awards for I'm So Hollywood in the Summer Saltz book series. Several of the books I've illustrated — including the recently published The Magic Red Dress and Theodore and Hazel and the Bird — featured in the February 2019 Alumni Art Exhibit at La Sierra University's Brandstater Gallery, in Riverside, CA.

A native of Sydney, Australia, I currently reside in Los Angeles with my husband and two crazy-sweet boys.

I look forward to working with you on your next project! Contact me.


-Elyse

Etsy Reviews

Visit myEtsy shopfor more reviews.


carolyndtarr (Nov 2018)


I had a great experience working with Elyse. She was so prompt and helpful. She did a beautiful painting of my in-laws home for a wedding gift for my nephew. It is so meaningful and I know it will be cherished for years to come!

LouAnneK (Nov 2018)


Elyse created a beautiful portrait of my friend's childhood home. I know he will love it! She was wonderful to work with. Great communication and suggestions to make this painting better than I had imagined. She was very friendly and welcoming with any requests for details that I had. I would definitely recommend Elyse and will order from her again in the future! Thank you, Elyse!

Andrea Petera (Nov 2018)


Elyse did an amazing job with 2 house portrait watercolors I ordered! love them!!

Alison Thompson (Oct 2018)


Elyse was amazing! Responded within minutes to my request and had the painting completed within 48 hours!! My siblings and I gave this to our parents for their 30th anniversary, and they absolutely loved it!

Anne Reaven (Oct 2018)


If I could give this shop owner 1,000,000 stars, I would. First and foremost, her customer service is top notch! We had a small issue (my fault 100%) and she solved it at no extra cost. Second, her product was beautiful. Third, the recipients of this gift cried when they saw it. They were truly shocked at how someone would be able to capture the magic of their home without ever seeing it.

amoses93 (Sept 2018)


She did such an amazing job with a pet portrait. Used as a wedding gift and my sister absolutely loved it! Highly recommend; she’s efficient and extremely flexible.

Let's Connect

Looking for a hand-painted, personalized gift idea? Visit my Etsy shop for more info, reviews, pricing, and to place your custom portrait order.


Could your children's book project use a creative, thoughtful artist's touch? Have a question for me? Send me an email, or fill out the contact form to start the conversation.
